string-array.name: ss_craglorn
string-array.item: "01. Lava flows where Ayleids walked – Molavar – Elinhir Wayshrine"

"03. Among Yokuda’s dead – Ruins of Kardala – Shada’s Tear Wayshrine"

"05. Where fishmongers sell no fish – Haddock’s Market – Belkarth Wayshrine"
"06. Where chisled tunnels meet crystal caverns – Chiselshriek Mine – Mountain Overlook Wayshrine"
"07. A sea of dunes beneath the earth – Buried Sands – Shada’s Tear Wayshrine"
"08. Under Centurion guard – Mtharnaz – Sandy Path Wayshrine"
"09. At the head of the class – Balamath – Inazzur’s Hold Wayshrine"

"11. Beyond the pillar of hunger – Tombs of the Na-Totambu – Sandy Path Wayshrine"
